name: The Monster of Kogane
description: If you play this level before completing 'Benton Boogie', Pots(the GG's dog) will be dog-napped! He will return later

name: No. 540
description: This is a standard level where you will need to collect cans, spray over graffiti, and avoid the police

name: Kogane Circus
description: This is a tag level. You need to tag each member of Poison Jam 10 times in order to beat this level.

name: Benton Boogie
description: If you complete this level before 'The monster of Kogane', the GG's garage will be invaded by frogs!

name: Love Trap
description: The player needs to spray over the Love Shockers graffiti and avoid Onishima and his police forces.

name: Shibuya GG
description: The player starts on top of the bus shelter and will need to spray graffiti points in the area.

name: Graffiti High
description: This level takes place in Benten-cho where the player needs to spray over the Noice Tanks's graffiti.

name: Noise Reduction
description: This is a tag level. You need to tag each member of the Noise Tanks 10 times in order to beat this level.

name: Love Attack
description: This is a tag level. You need to tag each member of the Love Shockers 10 times in order to beat this level.

name: Tag or Die
description: This is one of the Grind city levels the player needs to complete in order to unlock Goji Rokkaku.

name: Rock 'n Roll Grind
description: This is one of the Grind city levels the player needs to complete in order to unlock Goji Rokkaku.

name: Explosion
description: The player returns to Shibuya-cho to reclaim their territory from the Golden Rhinos who sprayed over the GG's existing graffiti.

name: Fight or Flight
description: This is a difficult level where the Golden Rhinos send aerial assassins and Assassin No.2 to stop the player.

name: Benten Burning
description: This level is one of the largest in the game. The player needs to spray over the Golden Rhinos graffiti and avoid the pyro-police force.

name: Behind the Mask
description: This level is one of the largest in the game. The player needs to spray Poison Jam again but this time, they are under mind-control by Goji Rokkaku.

name: Final Groove
description: This is the final level of the story, where the player has to avoid the Golden Rhinos again and face Goji at the end.
